examples.example: 在这一轮的比赛中，大家都发挥出了自己的最佳水平。

translate.english: In this round of the competition, everyone played to their best level.

examples.example: 经历了一轮又一轮的挑战，他始终保持着积极向上的心态。

translate.english: Having experienced round after round of challenges, he always keeps a positive attitude.

examples.example: 新的一轮朝阳缓缓升起，给大地带来了无限的生机与希望。

translate.english: A new round of the rising sun slowly rises, bringing infinite vitality and hope to the earth.
